entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as needing to give out notices and sample a tart. She is referred to by her first name, Minerva.

entities.name: minerva
entities.description: Minerva is another name for Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: severus
entities.description: Severus is another name for Professor Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is mentioned as being swept out of his office by McGonagall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being looked at with venom by Snape.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being looked at with venom by Snape.

relationships.description: McGonagall and Snape are leaving the office together.
Snape looks at Harry with venom.
Snape looks at Ron with venom.
McGonagall is leaving the office with Harry.
McGonagall is leaving the office with Ron.
